co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.items

Class ItemBaseModArmour

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.item.Item
      • net.minecraft.item.ItemArmor
        • co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.items.ItemBaseModArmour

  • public abstract class ItemBaseModArmour
extends net.minecraft.item.ItemArmor
    Yes, Americans, armour is spelled with a U over here. I'm English (as in, England English). 'NGLUND! (I suppose, I'm not sure what's the England equivalent of "'MURICA!" :P) END NATIONALITY PRIDE RANT This is the base for mod armour because of Mojang deciding it'd be a good idea to have an Enum decide the armour type. I made this at night, can you tell?
    Author:
    Niadel
